artist: Nicholas Africano; Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man seated in chair facing front; scissors in PR hand cutting hair
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop lower margin in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; a
title: Haircut, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
